sentences.en: A flowerpot is put in the corner of my study.
sentences.cn: 一盆花放在我书房的角落里.

sentences.en: Chaozhou Xingguang Porcelain Art Factory is professional in producing craft flowerpot and receptacle.
sentences.cn: 潮州市星光瓷艺厂是一家专业生产工艺花盆、花插的工厂.

sentences.en: Do you want me to eat dirt from a flowerpot?
sentences.cn: 你想让我把花盆里的土都吃了还是咋地?

sentences.en: He might as well plant an oak in a flowerpot, and expect it to thrive, as imagine he can restore her to vigour in the soil of his shallow cares!
sentences.cn: 他与其想象他能在他那浮浅的照料中使她恢复精力，还不如说正像把一棵橡树种在一个花盆里！

sentences.en: He was hit by a flowerpot which fell from upstairs, what an unexpected disaster!
sentences.cn: 他被楼上掉下的花盆砸伤了头部, 这真是飞来横祸啊!

sentences.en: I potted up a flower in the newly bought flowerpot.
sentences.cn: 我把一棵花种到了新买的花盆里.

sentences.en: It hides behind the flowerpot whenever human beings get close with it.
sentences.cn: 小猫一看到有人来,就马上躲在花盆后面了.

sentences.en: One of the products they have developed is a flowerpot.
sentences.cn: 他们用角蛋白制成的产品中,有一种是花盆.

sentences.en: Please do not place glass, vase, flowerpot and other water or liquid container onto the instrument.
sentences.cn: 切勿将水杯 、 花瓶 、 花盆和其他盛水或液体的容器放在本机上.

sentences.en: The environmentally friendly flower pot flowerpot is the work of two 2 researchers.
sentences.cn: 这种环保花盆是2名研究者的成果.

sentences.en: The flowerpot crashed to the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 花盆砰地一声摔碎在人行道上.

sentences.en: The resin sandstone flowerpot main use in feeding the flower.
sentences.cn: 沙岩花盆主要用于养花;腊烛台主要是圣诞节点腊烛用.

sentences.en: The water drained out of the flowerpot through the hole in the bottom.
sentences.cn: 水从花盆底部的洞漏出去.

sentences.en: This flowerpot is broken. Who knocked it _ over __?
sentences.cn: 花盆碎裂了. 谁打翻了它?

sentences.en: We produce some kinds of flowerpot, You can choose it on your basis.
sentences.cn: 我们生产不同种类的花坛, 您可以根据您的要求来选择.

sentences.en: We specializes in producing quality craft dolomite flowerpot and hand paint flowerpot.
sentences.cn: 本厂专业生产各式白云土轻质花盆及优质漆彩花盆.

trans.tran_en: a plastic or clay pot in which you grow plants
